articles.author: Joshua Zeitz
articles.title: Opinion | Trump and Rubio Used an Obscure Law to Attempt to Deport a Columbia Protester. In the Past, the Same Law Excluded Jews. - POLITICO
articles.description: All Americans should be shocked. American Jews should be deeply alarmed.
articles.content: The McCarran-Walter Act of 1952, known formally as the Immigration Nationality Act of 1952, empowers the secretary of state to expel foreign nationals who pose a threat to the United States. While th… [+9786 chars]

articles.author: Christina Larson
articles.title: Wombats are cute, furry marsupials — that shouldn’t be picked up - The Associated Press
articles.description: Wombats are furry, nocturnal marsupials found only in Australia. Baby wombats have recently been in the news after an American influencer filmed herself snatching a young joey from its mother, setting off a global conversation about mistreatment of wildlife. …
articles.content:
Wombats are furry, nocturnal marsupials found only in Australia.
